argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islssfgi.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 2 |  | islssfgi.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | islssfgi.x | |- X = ( W |`s ( N ` B ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqeltri | |- V e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( B e. ~P V <-> B C_ V ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_biimpri | |- ( B C_ V -> B e. ~P V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> B e. ~P V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> B e. Fin ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_elind | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> B e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N ` B ) = ( N ` B ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( a = B -> ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( a = B -> ( ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) <-> ( N ` B ) = ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( B e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) /\ ( N ` B ) = ( N ` B ) ) -> E. a e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 11, 14 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> E. a e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 17 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 18 | 2, 17, 1 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V ) -> ( N ` B ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> ( N ` B ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 20 | 3, 17, 1, 2 | #P_islssfg2 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( N ` B ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. a e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 21 | 16, 19, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> ( X e. LFinGen <-> E. a e. ( ~P V i^i Fin ) ( N ` a ) = ( N ` B ) ) ) |
| 22 | 15, 21 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ B C_ V /\ B e. Fin ) -> X e. LFinGen ) |
